recipes.label: A Problem to Study
recipes.startdescription: This task requires time and deep thought. I can approach it either with studiousness of Lantern or the intensity of Winter.
recipes.description: This task requires time and deep thought. I can approach it either with studiousness of Lantern or the intensity of Winter.

recipes.label: A Brilliant Focus
recipes.startdescription: I will shape my mind into lens to process information. It brightens the information that passes through it. I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: A Shining Focus
recipes.startdescription: I will shape my mind into lens to process information. Clear and strong, I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: A Singular Focus
recipes.startdescription: I will shape my mind into lens to process information. If it does not crack, I may succeed.

recipes.label: Still Concentration
recipes.startdescription: Inside my mind, thoughts crystalize in perfect form. I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Silent Concentration
recipes.startdescription: Inside my mind, thoughts sing like settling ice. I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Quiet Concentration
recipes.startdescription: Inside my mind, thoughts settle like snowflakes. I may succeed.
